gurmukhi: ਧਰਮ ਨ ਕਰ ਹੈ ੲੇਕ ਅਨੇਕ ਪਾਪ ਕੈ ਹੈ ਸਭ || ਲਾਜ ਬੇਚ ਤਜ ਫਿਰੈਂ ਸਕਲ ਜਗ || ਪਾਪ ਕਮੈਵਰ ਦੁਰਗਤ ਪੈ ਹੈਂ ਪਾਪ ਸਮੁੰਦ ਜੈ ਹੈ ਨ ਤਰ ||੭੭||
transliteration: Dharam Na Kar Hai Ek Anek Paap Kai Hai Sabh|| Laaj Bech Tah Phirain Sakal Jag|| Paap Kamaivah Durgad Pai Hain Paap Samounnd Jai Hai Na Tar||77||
translation: Not even performing one act of righteousness, all will commit sinful acts; they will move in the world unashamedly; they will earn through sinful acts and suffer catastrophies and will remain powerless and will not be able to ferry across the sea of sin.7

gurmukhi: ਠੳੁਰ ਠੳੁਰ ਨਵ ਮਤ ਚਲੇ ੳੁਠਾ ਧਰਮ ਕੋ ਦੌਰ || ਸੁਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਜਹ ਤਹ ਦੁਰ ਰਹੀ ਪਾਪ ਭੲਿਓ ਸਰਮੌਰ ||੭੮||
transliteration: Thaur Thaur Nav Mat Chale Outhaa Dharam Ko Daur|| Soukrit Jah Tah Dur Rahipaap Bhaio Sarmaur||78||
translation: New sects will arise at various places and the impact of dharma will end; the goodness will remain concealed and the sin will dance everywhere.78.

gurmukhi: ਜਹ ਤਹ ਕਰਨ ਲਗੇ ਸਭ ਪਾਪਨ || ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਤਜਿ ਕਰ ਹਰਿ ਜਾਪਨ || ਪਾਹਨ ਕੳੁ ਸੁ ਕਰਤ ਸਭ ਬੰਦਨ || ਡਾਰਤ ਧੂਪ ਦੀਪ ਸਿਰ ਚੰਦਨ ||੭੯||
transliteration: Jah Tah Karan Lage Paapan|| Dharam Karam Taj(i) Kar Har(i) Jaapan|| Paathan Kau Su Karat Sabh Bandan|| Daarat Dhoop Deep Sir Channdan||79||
translation: Here and there all will leave the religious injunctions and the remembrance of the Name of the Lord and perform the sinful acts; the stone-idols will be worshipped and only on them incense. Lamp-lights and sandal will be offered.79.

gurmukhi: ਜਹ ਤਹ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਤਜ ਭਾਗਤ || ੳੁਠ ੳੁਠ ਪਾਪ ਕਰਮ ਸੌ ਲਾਗਤ || ਜਹ ਤਹ ਭੲੀ ਧਰਮ ਗਤ ਲੋਪੰ || ਪਾਪਹ ਲਗੀ ਚੳੁਗਨੀ ਓਪੰ ||੮੦||
transliteration: Jah Tah Dharam Karam Taj Bhaagad|| Outh Outh Paap Karam Sau Laagad|| Jah Tah Dharam Gad Lopan|| Paapah Lagichaougadiopan||80||
translation: Here and there, forsaking the religious injunction, people will run away; they will be absorbed in sinful acts; no religion will remain visible and the sin will become fourfold.80.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਜਯੋ ਧਰਮ ਭਰਮ ਤਜ ਅਪਨਾ || ਜਾਨੁਕ ਹੁਤੋ ਲਖਾ ੲਿਹ ਸੁਪਨਾ || ਸਭ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਤਜੀ ਤ੍ਰੀਅ ਅਾਪਨ || ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਕੁਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਲਗੇ ਮਿਲ ਜਾਪਨ ||੮੧||
transliteration: Bhaajyo Dharam Bharam Taj Apnaa|| Jaanouk Bouto Lakhaa Eh Soupnaa|| Sabh Sansaar Tajitreea Aapan|| Mantra Koumantra Lage Mil Jaapan||81||
translation: Forsaking their religious injunctions the people will run away in such a way as if they had seen a bad dread; all the people will abandon their wives and will repeat evil notions.81.

gurmukhi: ਚਹੁਦਿਸ ਘੋਰ ਪ੍ਰਚੁਰ ਭੲਿਓ ਪਾਪਾ || ਕੋੳੂ ਨ ਜਾਪ ਸਕੈ ਹਰਿ ਜਾਪਾ || ਪਾਪ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਸਭ ਜਾ ਚਲ ਪੲੀ || ਧਰਮ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਯਾ ਜਗ ਤੈ ਗੲੀ ||੮੨||
transliteration: Chahudis Ghor Prachur Bhaio Paapaa|| Ko( i)  Na Jaap Sakai Har(i) Jaapaa|| Paap Kridaa Sabh Jaa Chal Paee|| Dharam Kridaa Yaa Jag Tai Gade||82||
translation: Because of the prevalence of sin in all the four directions, no one will be able to remember the Lord; the sinful tendencies will prevail in such a way that all the religious acts will be finished in the world.82.

gurmukhi: ਜਹਾਂ ਤਹਾਂ ਅਾਧਰਮ ੳੁਪਜੀਅਾ || ਜਾਨੁਕ ਧਰਮ ਪੰਖ ਕਰ ਭਜੀਅਾ || ਡੋਲਤ ਜਹ ਤਹ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਪਾਵਨ || ਲਾਗਤ ਕਤਹੀ ਧਰਮ ਕੋ ਦਾਵਨ ||੮੩||
transliteration: Jahaan Tahaan Aadharam Oupeejaa|| Jaanouk Dharam Pankh Kar Bhajeeaa|| Dolat Jah Tah Purakh Apaavan|| Laagad Kat-hi Dharam Ko Daavan||83||
translation: Because of the birth of adharma here and there, the dharma will get wings and fly away; the bad people will roam here and there and the turn of dharma will never come.83.

gurmukhi: ਅਰਥਹ ਛਾਡ ਅਨਰਥ ਬਤਾਵਤ || ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਚਿਤ ੲੇਕ ਨ ਲਿਅਾਵਤ || ਕਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਕੀ ਕ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਭੁਲਾਵਤ || ਜਹਾ ਤਹਾ ਅਾਰਿਸ਼ਟ ਬਤਾਵਤ ||੮੪||
transliteration: Arthah Chhaad Anarth Bataavat|| Dharam Karam Chit Ek Na Liaavat|| Karam Dharam Kikridaa Bhulaavat|| Jahaa Tahaa Aarisht Bataavat||84||
translation: The people will make meaningless all the meaningful things and will never let the notion of religious karmas enter there mind; forgetting the activities of dharma, they will propagate about sin here and there.84.

gurmukhi: ਧਰਮ ਨ ਕਰਹੀਂ || ਹਰਿ ਨ ੳੁਚਰਹੀਂ || ਪਰ ਘਰ ਡੋਲੈਂ ਜਲਹ ਬਿਰੋਲੈਂ ||੮੫||
transliteration: Dharam Na Kar-bin|| Har(i) Na Uhar- Bin|| Par Ghar Dolain|| Jalah Bidolain||85||
translation: They will not perform the acts of dharma; they will not utter the Name of the Lord; they will enter the houses of others and churning water, they will try to realise the essence.85.

gurmukhi: ਲਹੈ ਨ ਅਰਥੰ || ਕਹੈ ਅਨਰਥੰ || ਬਚਨ ਨ ਸਾਚੇ || ਮਤ ਕਰ ਕਾਚੇ ||੮੬||
transliteration: Lahai Na Arthan|| Kahai Anarthan|| Bachanndna Saache|| Mat Kar Kaadhe||86||
translation: Without understanding the real meaning, they will deliver useless speeches and adopting the temporary religions, they will never talk about the truth.86.
